item.description:
We first listed this event last year, and we had a most impressive turn-out. (And a great time!)

Sean is a childhood friend of mine who has taken his talents from Cape Cod to his studio on Newbury Street

Need a diversion from Baseball? Join us for some complimentary wine, hors d'oeuvre, wine, Sean's amazing art and a glass or two of wine.

Sean is a very personable artist who will walk us through the inspiration for some of his finest works, including Boston and Fenway pieces.

After we close down the reception, we will wander across the street to pick up the conversation over a glass of wine at a local bar/restaurant.

No cost, just come out to support a talented artist.

Good times...
item.name: (Baseball diversion)... Join our friend at his artist reception on Newbury.
